short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automates the login proccess on specific websites for Vizy students

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps Vizy students to login some specific websites with credentials that provided by the school. You can download this extension to use automatic login feature of digital campus
